title: Rest & Breathing
description: Sit quietly and do slow deep breathing for 5-10 minutes. Repeat if heart rate remains high.

title: Low-salt Diet & Walk
description: Reduce salt intake and take a brisk 20-30 minute walk daily.

title: Hydrate & Rest
description: Drink water, rest, and monitor temperature. Seek medical care if fever persists.

title: Seek Medical Help
description: Low oxygen detected. Contact healthcare services or visit emergency care if breathing difficulty occurs.
